name: No KO Grenades
description: Modify thrown grenades, impact explosives, the durian, and a couple of mines to either knock down NPCs or disable lock-on entirely. Has an option to disable dropping impact explosives.

options.name: Playing Online
options.tooltip: Needs to be checked to work online. If you enable this and use the Peacock server, you need to also install https://github.com/thepeacockproject/peacock-strings for Peacockâ€™s text to display properly.

options.name: Don't Drop the Nitro
options.tooltip: Disables dropping the Explosive Baseball, Explosive Golf Ball, Explosive Snow Globe, ICA Impact Explosive, Molotov Cocktail, Nitroglycerin, and Octane Booster.

options.name: Off
options.tooltip: Don't affect the default lock-on throw that knocks out NPCs.

options.name: Knock Down
options.tooltip: Change the lock-on to only knock down NPCs when thrown.

options.name: No Lock-On
options.tooltip: Remove the lock-on when throwing.
